name: purs-backend-es
description: A modern ECMAScript optimizing backend for PureScript

scripts.clean: cd backend-es && rm -rf .spago output && cd ../lib && rm -rf .spago output && cd ../processors && rm -rf .spago output && cd ../snapshots && rm -rf .spago output && cd ../test && rm -rf .spago output
scripts.preversion: npm run test && npm run test:output-diff
scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Bump purs-backend-es version ($npm_package_version)" && git tag purs-backend-es-v$npm_package_version
scripts.test:output-diff: npm run build && ./backend-es/index.js build --int-tags --output-dir=output-es2 && diff -r output-es output-es2 && rm -r output-es2
scripts.build: cd backend-es && spago build --purs-args "-g corefn,js" && node ./index.dev.js build && node ./index.dev.js bundle-module -m Main --int-tags --platform=node --minify --to=./bundle/index.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf backend-es/bundle output output-es && npm run build
scripts.format: purs-tidy format-in-place lib/src backend-es/src test/src snapshot/src extern/src postinstall/src
scripts.format:check: purs-tidy check lib/src backend-es/src test/src snapshot/src extern/src postinstall/src

author: Arista Networks
